sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const ServicesSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('services.titleBold')}{' '} {t('services.titleGradient')}

{t('services.subtitle')}

{t('services.stripe.title')}

{t('services.stripe.description')}

{/* Visual Features */}
{t('services.features.pciCompliant')}
{t('services.features.uptime')}
{t('services.features.fraudProtection')}

{t('services.subscription.title')}

{t('services.subscription.description')}

{/* Visual Features */}
{t('services.subscription.features.automatedBilling')}
{t('services.subscription.features.proration')}
{t('services.subscription.features.dunning')}

{t('services.marketplace.title')}

{t('services.marketplace.description')}

{/* Visual Features */}
{t('services.marketplace.features.multiVendor')}
{t('services.marketplace.features.splitPayments')}
{t('services.marketplace.features.shoppingCart')}
{/* Additional Services */}

{t('services.additional.title')}

{t('services.additional.subtitle')}

{t('services.additional.services.mobilePayments')}

{t('services.additional.services.creditCard')}

{t('services.additional.services.fraudProtection')}

{t('services.additional.services.paymentAnalytics')}

); }; export default ServicesSection;
